name: project-setup-team-tacoma-foreground
description: **Goal.** The COVID Travel Agent app is designed to provide prospective travelers with the most relevant knowledge to help them make a well-informed decision on international travel during the COVID pandemic. Particularly, the app aims at creating a personalized, comprehensive list of safest travel destinations based on the user's inputs (e.g. location, citizenship etc.), allowing the user to choose the most suitable destination for travel.
